existing_features.title: Add a back button to relevant pages (Products, Cart, Checkout, Order Confirmation, My Orders, Profile, Payment Failure, Payment Success) that navigates the user to the previous page in history. The button should be visually consistent with the app's warm Indian-themed design, placed at the top-left of the page content area, and should not appear on the Home page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a back button for navigation
